all.name: Mikeal Rogers
all.title: Node Foundation Q&A
all.desc:
Mikeal will be answering questions about the Node Foundation.

Please submit your questions by Friday 17th July

all.name: Joe Nash
all.title: Insert Token: Immersive UX with Tokenization
all.desc: Users of our apps and products yearn to be immersed; but so often, the worlds we build with software show surprising seams, shattering immersion for our users. In this talk, we'll look at the magic of tokenization, and how it can transform the UX of your application.

all.name: Izaak Rogan
all.title: Founders & Coders
all.desc:
Founders & Coders are a non-profit organisation, run with the objective of providing a first class training in full-stack JS, for free.

In this talk we will discuss the origins of Founders & Coders; why we started and our original goals. We will then talk about the last 18 months; how the organisation has developed and how our curriculum has shifted dramatically as we have experimented with different educational models. We will then talk briefly about the future of F&C; what we have planned and where we think our organisation is going.
